Feature Overview
The Camera Preview Extension is a practical tool designed specifically for the Chrome browser, allowing you to easily use your computer's camera to preview your image directly in the browser with left-right mirroring. This extension features an elegant interface design, providing an excellent user experience.

Key Features
Real-Time Camera Preview: Simply click the extension icon to open the embedded camera window without any additional steps.
Left-Right Mirror Effect: Provides left-right mirror effects, simulating a real mirror for convenient daily use.
Flip Functionality: Easily flip your camera preview horizontally with a single click, enhancing usability for different scenarios.
High-Quality Design: A beautifully designed interface that makes your camera preview more refined.
Easy to Use: With just a few setup steps, you can use it effortlessly without complicated operations.
Why Choose This Extension?
Instant Efficiency: Preview your camera image directly in the browser without opening other applications, convenient and fast.
Multi-Scenario Application: Whether it's for video conferences, online teaching, or daily photos, it can handle it with ease.
Lightweight Tool: Does not take up too many system resources, ensuring smooth usage.
High-Quality Interface: Simple yet sophisticated design provides a premium visual experience.
Installation Guide
Open the Chrome browser and go to the extension store.
Search for "Camera Preview Extension" and click the "Add to Chrome" button.
Follow the prompts to complete the installation.
Once installed, click the extension icon at the top right corner of the browser to start using it.
Usage Tips
Before video conferences or online teaching, preview your image to ensure you present your best look.
Use the flip functionality to switch the camera preview direction according to your preference.
The Camera Preview Extension is an essential tool for every Chrome browser user.
Install it now and enjoy a more convenient and efficient camera experience!
User Feedback and Improvements
Continuously improve the extension's functionality based on user feedback, such as adding window size adjustment and filter effects.

Security Considerations
Data Privacy: The extension should not store or transmit user image data; all processing should be done locally.
Camera Permissions: The extension should request camera access only when the user clicks on it, and release the permissions immediately after use.
If you encounter any issues, you can visit the support page or contact customer service for assistance.
